text: Uss say barh ker zalim kaun hai? Jissay uss kay rab ki aayaton say naseehat ki jaye woh phir bhi mun moray rahey aur jo kuch uss kay hathon ney aagay bhej rakha hai ussay bhool jaye be-shak hum ney unn kay dilon per parday daal diye hain kay woh issay (na) samajhen aur unn kay kanon mein girani hai go tu unhen hidayat ki taraf bulata rahey lekin yeh kabhi bhi hidayat nahi paney kay
